text: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 is a laptop computer developed by Microsoft. It was announced on 13 April 2021. It has 32/16/8GB RAM, 1TB/512/256/128GB SSD and 720P HD f2.0 camera. == Software == The Surface Laptop 4 run Windows 10 for the first time, it can upgrade to the other version like Windows 11 when came out. == References == Category:Microsoft Surface
title: Surface Laptop 4
